page.title: 13PLAYGROUND GAMES
page.content: The games we play on the yard are conkers (autumn)skipping good king Soloman,Plainsy,Mississippi,Someone in the bed,lip stick and powder,banana splits,pink pujamas all in as i was in the kichen,loopy di ENGLAND IRELAND,under the moon over the stars,hi lo sway hop,all the boys in our street,mrs?lives by the shore,tinker tailor,I call him my very best friend,Spanish lady,bumper car,skip,skip,skip,to my lu.Marbles(summer)dodgie(played with a tennis ball)Kingy is another version of dodge ball. {BOWBURN B.M.X TRACK}is in a Recreation park where there is also swing and a slide.It is about forty metres long its a circular track and its got two big whoops and everybody jumps off the second whoop because they are close together.
